p: The five days old oviposition treated with 47 ppm NE showed 91.7% unviable eggs after 24 h of treatment in B. straminea molluscs. At the concentration of 78 ppm, a reduction of the effect in B. straminea (17.3%) was observed. The molluscs B. tenagophila treated with 47 ppm exhibited 49.4% unviable eggs, and 78 ppm caused a greater effect with 82.5% unviable eggs in 24 h.
